text:
@NYGovCuomo You and @NYCMayor want to crush small business and anyone who dares stand up and say enough.

https://t.co/2iX4w3WhpM

https://t.co/ZnbrKN0IQp

And you want a bailout to keep spending like the drunken fools you are acting like.  Yes, I know, I insulted drunken fools.
